mapper.select: select count(*) actives from shipment_item where active="A" and shipment_id=#{param1}
select distinct shipment_id from shipment_item where active = #{param1}

select s.shipment_id, s.customer_id, c.name customer , s.purchase, s.exp_date, s.act_date, ovv.exp_volume, ovv.act_volume, ovv.transfer_id from shipment s join customer c on s.customer_id = c.id join order_volume_vw ovv on s.shipment_id = ovv.shipment_id where s.shipment_id = #{param1} order by s.exp_date desc
select content_cd code, sum(exp_volume_max) value from shipment_item group by content_cd

select i.shipment_id, i.item_no, coalesce(i.content_cd,'') content_cd , coalesce(i.content_cd,'N') new_item, i.active , coalesce(i.exp_volume_min,0) min_vol , coalesce(i.exp_volume_max,100000) max_vol , coalesce(i.act_volume,0) act_vol , i.carrier_id, i.transfer_id, i.station_id from shipment_item i where i.shipment_id = #{param1} union select s.shipment_id, h.hold_no, '' content_cd, 'Y' new_item, null active , 0 min_vol, coalesce(h.volume*h.no_duplicates,100000) max_vol , 0 act_vol, null carrier_id, null transfer_id, null station_id from shipment s join shipment_item si on s.shipment_id=si.shipment_id right outer join hold h on si.carrier_id=h.carrier_id where s.shipment_id= #{param1} and h.hold_no not in (select item_no from shipment_item where shipment_id=s.shipment_id) order by item_no

select i.shipment_id, i.item_no, i.carrier_id , coalesce(i.content_cd,'') content_cd , coalesce(i.content_cd,'N') new_item , coalesce(i.exp_volume_min,0) min_vol , coalesce(i.exp_volume_max,100000) max_vol , coalesce(i.act_volume,0) act_vol , i.active, i.transfer_id, i.station_id from shipment_item i where i.transfer_id = #{param1}

select distinct s.shipment_id, s.customer_id, c.name customer , s.purchase, s.exp_date, s.act_date, ovv.exp_volume , ovv.act_volume from shipment s join customer c on s.customer_id = c.id join order_volume_vw ovv on s.shipment_id = ovv.shipment_id join active_order_vw aov on s.shipment_id = aov.shipment_id where aov.sc != 0 order by s.exp_date desc

select s.shipment_id, s.customer_id, c.name customer , s.purchase, s.exp_date, s.act_date, ovv.exp_volume, ovv.act_volume, ovv.transfer_id from shipment s join shipment_item si on s.shipment_id=si.shipment_id join customer c on s.customer_id = c.id join order_volume_vw ovv on s.shipment_id = ovv.shipment_id where si.active = 'P' order by s.exp_date

select si.shipment_id, si.item_no, si.active, coalesce(si.content_cd,'') content_cd , si.transfer_id, coalesce(si.content_cd,'N') new_item, si.carrier_id , coalesce(si.exp_volume_min,0) min_vol , coalesce(si.exp_volume_max,0) max_vol , coalesce(si.act_volume,0) act_vol from shipment_item si left outer join tag t on si.carrier_id=t.id where si.active = 'P' and si.shipment_id = #{param1}
select count(*) from shipment_item where active='P' and content_cd = #{param1}

select s.shipment_id, s.customer_id, c.name customer , s.purchase, s.exp_date, s.act_date, ovv.exp_volume, ovv.act_volume from shipment s join customer c on s.customer_id = c.id join order_volume_vw ovv on s.shipment_id = ovv.shipment_id where s.purchase = #{param1} and s.exp_date > current_date()-interval 3 month order by s.exp_date desc

select s.shipment_id, s.customer_id, c.name customer , s.purchase, s.exp_date, s.act_date, ovv.exp_volume, ovv.act_volume from shipment s join customer c on s.customer_id = c.id join order_volume_vw ovv on s.shipment_id = ovv.shipment_id where s.exp_date > current_date()-interval 1 week order by s.exp_date desc

select s.shipment_id, s.customer_id, c.name customer , s.purchase, s.exp_date, s.act_date, ovv.exp_volume, ovv.act_volume from shipment s join customer c on s.customer_id = c.id join order_volume_vw ovv on s.shipment_id = ovv.shipment_id where s.exp_date > current_date()-interval 1 month order by s.exp_date desc
